typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		Name as string,
		DepId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DFEmpDemo
source(output(
		DepId as string,
		DepName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DFDep
DFEmpDemo, DFDep join(DFEmpDemo@DepId == DFDep@DepId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['EmpDep'],
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		EmpId,
		Name,
		DepId = DFEmpDemo@DepId,
		DepName
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EmpDepData

source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		Name as string,
		DepId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpDetails
EmpDetails aggregate(groupBy(DepId,
		Name),
	DepWiseCount = count(Name)) ~> AggregateEmp
AggregateEmp sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		DepId,
		EmpId = DepWiseCount
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		weekly_count as integer,
		year_week as string,
		rate_14_day as double,
		cumulative_count as integer,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> coviddeathcases
coviddeathcases filter(continent =='Europe' && not(isNull(country_code))) ~> EuropeFilter
EuropeFilter sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		sourceRelativeURL as string,
		sinkFileName as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		v as string,
		key as ({_id} as string),
		name as string,
		ns as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> source1
source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		Name as string,
		DepId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 select(mapColumn(
		{Index Name} = name,
		{Collection Name} = ns
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
source2 derive(EmpDetails = @(EmpId=EmpId,
		Name=Name,
		DepId=DepId)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select1 derive({Index Name} = {Index Name},
		{Collection Name} = split({Collection Name}, '.')[2],
		{DB Name} = split({Collection Name}, '.')[1]) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['final.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		name = {Index Name},
		ns = {Collection Name},
		{DB Name}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		sourceRelativeURL as string,
		sinkFileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['csvjson'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		EmpDetails
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2

source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(DCName = substring(Column_1, 22, 50),
		DCUId = substring(Column_1, 80, 96)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
